mapper.insert: insert into bus_bpmn_info (bpmn_name, bpmn_type, deployment_id, act_process_id, act_process_key, deploy_time, info) values (#{bpmnName}, #{bpmnType}, #{deploymentId}, #{actProcessId}, #{actProcessKey}, #{deployTime}, #{info})
mapper.update: update bus_bpmn_info set bpmn_name = #{bpmnName}, bpmn_type = #{bpmnType}, deployment_id = #{deploymentId}, act_process_id = #{actProcessId}, act_process_key = #{actProcessKey}, deploy_time = #{deployTime}, info = #{info} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select id, bpmn_name, bpmn_type, deployment_id, act_process_id, act_process_key, deploy_time, info from bus_bpmn_info where id = #{id}
select id, bpmn_name, bpmn_type, deployment_id, act_process_id, act_process_key, deploy_time, info from bus_bpmn_info
mapper.update: update bus_bpmn_info set info = #{info} where id = #{id}
